title: Communication-Aware Design for Distributed Learning and Inference in IoT Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of IoT systems and foundational machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: A beginner-level education program for current practitioners, requiring mobile-optimized content design. Learning focuses on application cases in real IoT network environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental principles of distributed learning and inference algorithms in IoT environments.
Learners can analyze system performance changes based on communication channel conditions and design optimization strategies.
Learners can apply core concepts of the COMSPLIT framework (adaptive split learning, early termination strategies, etc.) to practical scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
